question.text: <math><msub><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></math> plants are most efficient plants of tropical climate and

options.text: have large number of chloroplasts and thick walls of bundle sheath cells
form 4-C organic acids in bundle sheath cell
perform primary <math><mi>C</mi><msub><mrow><mi>O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math> fixation in bundle sheath cells

solution.text: C<sub>4</sub> plants show kranz anatomy. CO<sub>2</sub> fixation in C<sub>4</sub> plants occur twice, first in mesophylls chroloplast with help of enzymes PEP carboxylase and second in bundle sheet chloroplast with help of enzymes RUBISCO. Because RUBISCO function in C<sub>4</sub> plants as carboxylase photorespiration is avoided.
